content:
ðŸ‘‹ â€¢ Hey, I'm Arthur! I'm a self-taught developer from France who enjoys Roblox, Fortnite and rhythm games.
I have experience in Luau, and I know a few other programming languages.

I was tired of my old website with broken CSS and I wasn’t working on it. But I discovered this fabulous tool called Hugo, which is an amazing program that transforms regular markdown files into websites using templates! I went with the Blowfish one as it is pretty and well documented.
title: Upgraded my website to Hugo!
